item.title: About me
item.description: Computer science graduate currently employed on CounterCraft. I do stuff on my spare time.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Spartan game entine GNU/Linux port (WIP) Port of the Spartan game engine to the GNU/Linux operating system. Skills learned: Differences on Windows/GNU toolchains Userspace slab allocator (Finished) Userspace slab allocator to investigate it’s usefulness. Project used as my end of degree project. Skills learned: Inner workings of the SLAB allocator Low level userspace linux memory management Writing skills DTB Parser (Finished) Command line utility for parsing DTB files.
